snippet: With this feature, people without Skype accounts can call those with accounts from landlines and cellphones. Also, using Spotlight to find files on a Mac.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A on adjusting Spotlight in Mac OS X 10.9.4 operating system; using Skype to pick up regular telephone calls; Tip of the Week on using Twitter's Analytics Dashboard.
lead_paragraph: With this feature, people without Skype accounts can call those with accounts from landlines and cellphones. Also, using Spotlight to find files on a Mac.

headline.main: How to Sign Up for a Skype Number
headline.print_headline: How to Sign Up for a Skype Number
